column3: “Sour Grapes is a strain I believe to be by Gage Green Genetics. If so, it makes sense, as this strain is some real quality. The sample I had was a little under-grown, yet somehow the trichome coverage was still unbelievable. When I first picked it up, I was smoking it along side some really heady indicas, and it stood out by really relaxing me in a way the other could not. I found myself reminiscing of traveling the ...”

“EXCEPTIONAL for outdoor use! Immediately gives you wide-eyed crystal clear vision and an undeniable euphoric positiveness that pairs magically with being in nature.

Vaped a TON without a hint of paranoia. Just feel-good vibes through and through.”
“i like this strand alot its fun to walk around and just space one of my favorite things about this strand is how everything seems happy and bright on a sunny day”
“This strain hits like a good hybrid should. Its got an initial head high that fades into a nice body stone. Has a thick grape tasting smoke with hints of diesel.”

“I originally got this one because I like grape bud (and it smelled a lot like grape in the jar at the dispensary), but also because it was $8 a gram. Maybe the price will go up later depending on the grower, but at that price, I gotta give this bud 5 stars, hands down! (I would have given it 4.5 stars if it were $10 a gram)

First of all, GRAPE! If you like grape tasting bud like Sour Grape or Killer Grape, you'll lo...”

“• Presently smoking thc-15% BEAUTY-bud —> hybrid Grape 🍇 Stomper from Theraplant. While it's a fairly low thc-content (& therefore a great strain for MMJ-newbies!), I still got top-floor, head to toe euphoria after approx 5-6 tokes of 1 water bong-bowl. Beautiful deep hues of purple, green + orange; low terpene profile|%, so flavor is def more on the piney, Chem Sour D, sativa-side, as opposed to leaning toward the ...”
“very nice hybrid indica dominant, has a nice fruity smell and taste. actually taste like grapes. wonderful for pain, eating disorder, insomnia, and depression.”

“🍇🍬 Grape Stomper is a mild and pleasant hybrid that is wonderful anytime of day! Although relaxing, it will not ruin your day. It will fill you with bliss and put your mind at ease, all while increasing sociability. It smells and tastes like grape. Fantastic flavor when smoked. I like to take a few bong rips of this strain before work, paired up with a pure sativa. Very nice strain for making salads! Would recommen...”

“Sour Grapes aka Purle Snowman from Gage Green Genetics is my favorite keeper !

Tastes like something citric/acid.. it makes ur mouth water, it's incredible. my selected pheno shows purple colors even without a cold enviroment.

The high is uplifting and also realives pain, really good for depression.

potent, sugar covered bitch!”

“Tried this for the first time on recommendation of the young lady Karla that was working...Needless to say it is AMAZING!!!!!  I have an extremely high tolerance to most medications and this one did the job extremely well.  It is a 50/50/ hybrid and it is the only one besides the Sour Diesel that has helped alleviate a multitude of pains.  That said....it is not for the light weights...if you are a lightweight for la...”

“I'd have to say that of all of the Sativas I've sampled, Grape Stomper is my favorite. It provides an energized buzz that's great for being productive, in fact, it makes me feel as though I've had a couple cups of coffee...I also found Grape Stomper to provide noticeable relief from pain...”

“This is an okay strain, not the best I've ever smoked, but not the worst either. I'm more of a Sativa smoker, I like the head high. This strain made me extremely relaxed, but creative and talkative at the same time. My body has slight tingles from the waist up, and overall was an enjoyable high. I don't care for the taste, it really tastes like sour grapes. The buds I got were huge,sticky, and dense. Recommended for ...”

“Awesome mouth watering taste... With a natural grape taste, even in a diamond cigar I felt like a swig of grape soda laced my blunt. The smoke hits your chest with the most pleasant high. Uplifts your thoughts and calms your lower body.”
“In Connecticut We call this Elioraca".

column1: The flowers are beautiful in looks and taste.  With a green / purple color and a slight grape scent. The smoke is smooth and the effects lowered my anxiety making the daily chores fly by.”"

column3: “I really, really, really want to love this strain, but I just can't give 5 stars.  Nothing personal against it but I have a bad reaction.  I call this my grape bubblicious Perma-grin strain--tastes great.  The first 30-45 minutes of smoking gives me this sh*t eating grin and a very happy, relaxed feeling, but then I pay the price. I go dark without warning...start beating myself up and think I'm the most horrific per...”

“I've got some mild psychiatric issues, and at first, this strain gave me some paranoia, irritability, and oversensitivity to sound, but once it wore off, it felt nice and witty. The bad part only lasted about ten minutes. This would be a good strain to write comedy on, I felt like I could access that side of myself easier. I had a bout of snooziness pretty shortly after smoking that went away. A little bit of fullnes...”

“I picked up an eighth of Grapestomper at GroHi Station here in SE Portland, Oregon and I love it.
It gives a good tingly head and body high without any paranoia or anxiety. It makes you feel awake and sociable while still feeling chill and relaxed.”

“Happy, warm body buzz within minutes. Excellent strain for PAIN. I suffer headaches and neck pain from sports injuries and feel great having just consumed only a third of a gram through a bong. Taste is sugary and fruity. The crystallization on this strain looks like sugar on sour candy, I can't describe it anyway else. I am obviously going to check out the experience on a higher dose.”

“Wow... did not see it coming. It just creeped up and put me in a state of calm, relaxed state and the best part pain free.  just need to tune up the amount I need.. too much of this strain put me into heart pounding panic without the ability to run.  After, some time to level off.. it is perfect......for me.  I read a review that said this strain should be only used by experienced users..."  I find this to be true.....”"
“Good head high.  Creeper weed with lots of happy energy to offer.  Tastes like grapes!  Love this strain and would happily smoke it any time.  Pretty good for pain, too.”
“A indica dominate hybrid weed, I felt like my brain dropped all the way to the bottom of the couch, it has a good balance if s/i, good with Netflix”

“Wow...I'm a veteran smoker and have a really high tolerance to begin with.  This medicine works for me on all levels.  ALL levels.  The description within Leafly is spot on in my opinion.  I'm exactly 58 mins in after 3 healthy pulls and I'm high as a f^ckin kite right now.  Zero pain, and I just broke my leg 10 days ago.  Super grinny.  Talkative.  SUPER happy with an elevated overall sense of well being.  Just happ...”

“First and foremost this is a good strain for people who just started smoking and/or don't necessarily like the other high THC strains. I got this strain at NETA Brookline with a TAC of 16.6%.

However, personally for me this high was too mild and helped the pain just a little bit. To be completely honest I was really let down by this strain. Maybe I just got my hopes up but as a hybrid the high is really weak and I d...”
“The strain was Grape Stomper which Leafly doesn't list. Read reviews on both, probably the same strain but the name was changed to Sour Grapes.”
“The strain was Grape Stomper which Leafly doesn't list. Read reviews on both, probably the same strain but the name was changed to Sour Grapes.”

“The grape stopper was amazing for my extremely high pain levels, but also didn't have me crawling on the floor. It's a great head high and your able to focus very well. I would highly recommend for day time use.”

“You feel it in the head, face and limbs and body.
It's numbing tingly euphoric effect.
Aswell as an uplifting clear headed energetic high.
Stimulates appetite (*munchies*).
Can be perfectly used in daytime or nighttime.
But better to use at night if you are a low tolerance/vape toker.”

“A great version of Sgp can be found at TGS.  Called Grape Escape, it is a hidden treasure in their lineup.  The taste profile is excellent - the Csd comes through on the exhale.  Killer stone @26+%.  Over-the-top.  ns”

“'Grape Stomper' 3.8/5 Smell is typical skunkiness with a tinge of fruitiness. One bowl out a medium sized bubbler. Effects are quick to onset in the head, with a typical hybrid buzz not characteristic of a sativa or indica, but somewhere in the middle. Body high sets in a couple moments later with a nice energetic tingle that fades with time. Not a bad one, but there isn't anything particularly noteworthy about  this...”

“Sativa dominate at 60 to 70% Sativa. Chunky lighter green buds covered in a ton of frosty crystals with amber hairs. Taste & smell was a milder sweet sour grape which made for a smoother smoke. Cerebral high at once making me happy & uplifted. Followed by nice body relaxation without the heavy/sleepy effects. Mine was Home Grown & it did get the job done but,the effects did not last long. Would buy an eighth from a d...”

“The sense of peace and wellbeing brought on by this strain is deep, immediate, and long lasting and is accompanied by a pleasant background energetic buzz. 

Maximum awareness and maximum chill are both guaranteed.”
“For the second time now, my girlfriend and I have gotten extremely giggly and silly from smoking Grape Stomper. We suddenly found everything each other said hilarious.”

“The nest phenotype of the this strain was developed and is sold by Bluesky Coffee shop in Oakland. Partnered with Oaksterdam they sell some of the best medicine in all of Cali, in my opinion its the best weed in the world.”
“This stuff messes me up. An almost uncomfortable high ha but i like it”
“Stomper is a good get together strain. a nice cerebral affect had me pretty talkative”
“For the second time now, my girlfriend and I have gotten extremely giggly and silly from smoking Grape Stomper. We suddenly found everything each other said hilarious.”
“Tastes like chemicals, but i was trippin BALLS. MAD couchlock and slump, couldnt even play video games man. 10/10”

“The potency does not suit the needs for a heavy smoker. Got a light head buzz that lasted about 15 minutes then disappeared as quickly as it came on. Won't be trying this strain again any time soon. Disappointed..”

“Une sativa très énergique, un buzz cérébral qui dure longtemps en diminuant vers un bon down endormant.


Un bon gout fruité et terreux mais un peu rough”
“Really great head and body high. great if you want to feel the music. I know I do.”
“Great taste, covered in crystals, and an aroma that grabs you! This really helps the pain without dragging my feet all day. I definitely recommend this strain for day time pain relief!”
“For the second time now, my girlfriend and I have gotten extremely giggly and silly from smoking Grape Stomper. We suddenly found everything each other said hilarious.”
“Stomper is a good get together strain. a nice cerebral affect had me pretty talkative”

“The potency does not suit the needs for a heavy smoker. Got a light head buzz that lasted about 15 minutes then disappeared as quickly as it came on. Won't be trying this strain again any time soon. Disappointed..”
“Tastes like chemicals, but i was trippin BALLS. MAD couchlock and slump, couldnt even play video games man. 10/10”
“Really great head and body high. great if you want to feel the music. I know I do.”

“Heavily under the influence of this strain at the moment. I'm looking at my 150-gallon freshwater aquarium, thinking of how pissed off my angel fish look because I haven't fed them yet this morning. Angel fish are the most consistently pissed-off aquarium fish I've ever had.

This strain is almost perfect for me, as it is so multi-purpose. I get the pain relief I need, it stops the nausea, calms me down and can pick ...”
“You will laugh your ass off!”
“Great taste, covered in crystals, and an aroma that grabs you! This really helps the pain without dragging my feet all day. I definitely recommend this strain for day time pain relief!”

“This is my first time smoking Grape Stomper and I would have to give it an 9/10 for taste. It’s really sweet with only a hint of sour. All together it’s probably an 8/10. It has made me feel very relaxed and almost euphoric but it has given me headache. Probably won’t buy again though.”

“This is a fantastic strain...I’m a patient in Massachusetts and I’m using this as a distillate vape cartridge and it’s amazingly tasty and it certainly does the trick! I feel much better,less anxious which is a HUGE PROBLEM FOR ME,ANXIETY!! I always try to choose Indica or a Hybrid that’s more of an Indica but again loving this strain Grape Stomper,I’m a New Fan!! ✌🏻♥️🤗Sara from Massachusetts”
“really good taste and a super strong high. Good for relaxed skiing!”
“Wow! Super smooth and gentle. No harsh or hard taste or coughing sensations!”

“Purchased under the moniker Grape Stomper at a local dispensary. Fuity, berry goodness. The berry flavor on this was like a punch to the brain, shockingly strong and pungent, even in the form of budder. Gives some nice daytime pain relief, mildly sedating but still functional. Leaves me floating through my day. My only complaint is that it's a little too cerebral for my liking, making it easy to get lost in one's tho...”

“Sour Grapes or Grape Stomper, is a fantastic sativa dominant blend. A cross between Purple Elephant and ChemDawg Sour Diesel. The bud is light green, orange hairs, with a thick covering of trichromes. It has the smell of grape candy and sour notes, the taste is very similar.

The indica is very apparent in the onset with a physical body and head buzz, which has an easy transition to intense cerebral, thought-provokin...”

“This strain was a nice wake and bake. Woke up rolled up a joint, first thing you notice is the grape smell just from the buds. As you smoke you get a sweet taste. As you medicate you feel fast acting relief and energy but you are high as shit. Good for mornings and mid day smoke breaks.”
“This strain is so delicious...I definitely enjoyed that sweet grape candy taste while my body is enjoying the relaxing effects.”

“This is a fantastic strain...I’m a patient in Massachusetts and I’m using this as a distillate vape cartridge and it’s amazingly tasty and it certainly does the trick! I feel much better,less anxious which is a HUGE PROBLEM FOR ME,ANXIETY!! I always try to choose Indica or a Hybrid that’s more of an Indica but again loving this strain Grape Stomper,I’m a New Fan!! ✌🏻♥️🤗Sara from Massachusetts”

“Hit sup strong. Smoked with a honey back wood. 5 fucking star possibly the best high ever. Euphoric. Would smoke every dai if possible. Oof.

-Savannah

Made my eyelids feel super heavy. Spaced out a lot Super mellow and relaxing. Had to watch something funny like the Office it also made me giggly 
Extremely pleasant A+++ also this weed kind of makes me feel drunk?

-Riley”

“Purchased under the moniker Grape Stomper at a local dispensary. Fuity, berry goodness. The berry flavor on this was like a punch to the brain, shockingly strong and pungent, even in the form of budder. Gives some nice daytime pain relief, mildly sedating but still functional. Leaves me floating through my day. My only complaint is that it's a little too cerebral for my liking, making it easy to get lost in one's tho...”
“Great head high and feeling of tranquility. This strains clears the mind and promotes openness and adventure. Nice to be in nature on a sunny day while smoking this strain.”

“4/22/18
-Smoked Outside
-Grape Stomper
-from Urban Greenhouse, Phoenix AZ
-Smoked a blunt, tropical twist white owl wrap.
-Smoked at 9pm directly after a very unimpressive blunt of stem-filled, low quality OG Kush (I think) and the previous day I didn’t smoke at all.
-Bud was fresh and fluffy, light green, and covered in white crystals inside and out.
-Started off with an intense and uplifting head high that was clea...”
“really good taste and a super strong high. Good for relaxed skiing!”

“This is one of my favorite strains that I pick up from GreenPharms in Mesa. The aroma matches the name very well with a very sweet grape scent. The high is so clear and free allowing me to get things done while still medicating. It pairs well with a nice Indica to balance your evening out.”
“Love this giggling effect and munchies. No pain at all!”

“Has a fruity, sour kind of smell. Pretty strong scent, but very    pleasant. Lots of tricomes and a few red hairs. Nice bright green color to it. Smooth, strong pleasant taste that stays with you. Felt the first hit right behind my eyes within the first few min. Second hit did the job (im not a super heavy smoker. I’d say I smoke 1-2 bowls a day most days). Felt really relaxed, numb almost. Really floaty and euphoric...”
“Wow! Super smooth and gentle. No harsh or hard taste or coughing sensations!”

“Wow this strain smells fruity! I gotta say it is a nice sweet smoke too. The effects were a little underwhelming at first but then it started to creep up on me and soon I was thoroughly medicated. I’m not huge into sativa but this was one I enjoyed. Not a ton of body effects but it did clear up my nausea.”
“It's pretty good. Gives some pretty good relaxation but nothing exceptional when it comes to a buzz.”
“really good taste and a super strong high. Good for relaxed skiing!”

“Purchased under the moniker Grape Stomper at a local dispensary. Fuity, berry goodness. The berry flavor on this was like a punch to the brain, shockingly strong and pungent, even in the form of budder. Gives some nice daytime pain relief, mildly sedating but still functional. Leaves me floating through my day. My only complaint is that it's a little too cerebral for my liking, making it easy to get lost in one's tho...”

“Very, very nice hybrid.  Strong enough and a great mix of sativa/indica.  A bit trippy, but definitely relaxed.  No anxiety, not overbearing, just a warm, slightly fuzzy feel.  A real favorite of mine.

Listening to Pink Floyd right now and it takes me back to the concerts I attended in the 70's.  Good smoke for kicking back.”
“Love this giggling effect and munchies. No pain at all!”

“Tasty Terps no doubt this crumble version is insane. The taste lingers in your mouth but it’s not a bad thing it’s so tasty that kind of wish there was a candy flavor of it. Really makes you feel great activates the creativity in your mind if you’re more connected with everything around you the energy vibes music. You feel awesome.”
“Abosolutely blown away definitely felt both the sativa and indica effects highly recommend for pain relief.”
“A great afternoon buzzy high. Mostly heady, but settles into the toes after a bit. A little heavy, but not enough to slow you down if you want to get out and about.”
“Wow! Super smooth and gentle. No harsh or hard taste or coughing sensations!”
“Great head high and feeling of tranquility. This strains clears the mind and promotes openness and adventure. Nice to be in nature on a sunny day while smoking this strain.”

“It's like the inside of my brain is tingling... this is a really nice, focus-y get into a movie or book kind of high. I could kind of taste the grape, but made it taste even grapier by eating a grape jelly rancher...anyway, feeling really light and loose in my head and body. no couch lock. wanna do something like draw, read or write...awesome strain.”
“really good taste and a super strong high. Good for relaxed skiing!”

“Fantastic strain, after having a rough day at work, I smoked some and now I feel like I've just slept 8 hours; that is after a roughly half an hour couch lock. My body and face feel a little heavy, but i think I could get up and go somewhere if need be. This would be an awesome strain for a small get together.”
“Abosolutely blown away definitely felt both the sativa and indica effects highly recommend for pain relief.”

“It's like the inside of my brain is tingling... this is a really nice, focus-y get into a movie or book kind of high. I could kind of taste the grape, but made it taste even grapier by eating a grape jelly rancher...anyway, feeling really light and loose in my head and body. no couch lock. wanna do something like draw, read or write...awesome strain.”

The indica is very apparent in the onset with a physical body and head buzz, which has an easy transition to intense cerebral, thought-provokin...”
“Great head high and feeling of tranquility. This strains clears the mind and promotes openness and adventure. Nice to be in nature on a sunny day while smoking this strain.”
“Love this giggling effect and munchies. No pain at all!”
“Excellent strain. I loved the smell and the effects of this hybrid. Felt energized, strong body high. Bet social.”

“What can you say. This sweet Grape Punch smelling herb is amazing. I've encountered Grape Stomper crossed with Grape Stomper OG, via Mettrum Medical Cannabis. A relaxing and cerebral stone. The only thing; is it almost smells to good to smoke. My Mother in Law found my prescription and being unaware dismissed it as dehydrated kiwi! I really wish this strain was still available. If you get a chance try it out; hey see...”

“Wow this strain smells fruity! I gotta say it is a nice sweet smoke too. The effects were a little underwhelming at first but then it started to creep up on me and soon I was thoroughly medicated. I’m not huge into sativa but this was one I enjoyed. Not a ton of body effects but it did clear up my nausea.”
“Great for pain. Leaves you with an overall uplifting feeling. Can be used as a daytime remedy.”
“Wow! Super smooth and gentle. No harsh or hard taste or coughing sensations!”

“Purchased under the moniker Grape Stomper at a local dispensary. Fuity, berry goodness. The berry flavor on this was like a punch to the brain, shockingly strong and pungent, even in the form of budder. Gives some nice daytime pain relief, mildly sedating but still functional. Leaves me floating through my day. My only complaint is that it's a little too cerebral for my liking, making it easy to get lost in one's tho...”

The indica is very apparent in the onset with a physical body and head buzz, which has an easy transition to intense cerebral, thought-provokin...”
“Grape candy on the nose. A little spicey. Good for pain, and sleep!”
“Super awesome I'd give it 10 stars”

“Grape Stomper OG Aka SourGrapes is a creeper in my book pure hybrid, this  strain is known for social gatherings and for pain relief it's healing ways will leave you happy and uplifted but same time euphoric it is strong, tasting fruity and the smell friuity.”
“I liked the way it came on with a rush of intense colors, blue and red. As the initial rush settled, it left me with a nice cosy high. Great for going to the movies, immediate pain relief.”

“Sour Grapes or Grape Stomper, is a fantastic sativa dominant blend. A cross between Purple Elephant and ChemDawg Sour Diesel. The bud is light green, orange hairs, with a thick covering of trichromes. It has the smell of grape candy and sour notes, the taste is very similar.

The indica is very apparent in the onset with a physical body and head buzz, which has an easy transition to intense cerebral, thought-provokin...”

“It's like the inside of my brain is tingling... this is a really nice, focus-y get into a movie or book kind of high. I could kind of taste the grape, but made it taste even grapier by eating a grape jelly rancher...anyway, feeling really light and loose in my head and body. no couch lock. wanna do something like draw, read or write...awesome strain.”

“Grape Stomper OG Aka SourGrapes is a creeper in my book pure hybrid, this  strain is known for social gatherings and for pain relief it's healing ways will leave you happy and uplifted but same time euphoric it is strong, tasting fruity and the smell friuity.”
“Super awesome I'd give it 10 stars”

“smoked sour grapes before wasn't too impressed went to another dispensary today got grape stomper 
smells similar to Irish spring body was mixed with ginger you get with sushi 
very sticky yet crispy crunchy very sweet nice fruity taste unique 4 star bud”
“Great head high and feeling of tranquility. This strains clears the mind and promotes openness and adventure. Nice to be in nature on a sunny day while smoking this strain.”
“Excellent strain. I loved the smell and the effects of this hybrid. Felt energized, strong body high. Bet social.”
“This strain is so delicious...I definitely enjoyed that sweet grape candy taste while my body is enjoying the relaxing effects.”

“Absolutely beautiful smell and look. Crystals everywhere.  Very smooth and a bit floral. Can taste the grape on exhale but doesn't crack your lung.  Relaxing and calming  to the mind and body. Lovely strain.”

“This strain was a nice wake and bake. Woke up rolled up a joint, first thing you notice is the grape smell just from the buds. As you smoke you get a sweet taste. As you medicate you feel fast acting relief and energy but you are high as shit. Good for mornings and mid day smoke breaks.”

“It's like the inside of my brain is tingling... this is a really nice, focus-y get into a movie or book kind of high. I could kind of taste the grape, but made it taste even grapier by eating a grape jelly rancher...anyway, feeling really light and loose in my head and body. no couch lock. wanna do something like draw, read or write...awesome strain.”
“I liked the way it came on with a rush of intense colors, blue and red. As the initial rush settled, it left me with a nice cosy high. Great for going to the movies, immediate pain relief.”

“Got a gram of Grape Stomper and just smoked some in a squeaky clean bowl. Initial reaction of the smoke was that it had a bit of a peppery quality to it. Upon a few exhales, I definitely couldn't resist the urge to cough and felt a mild sting in the nostrils. Not unpleasant, but wasn't what I'd call a smooth smoke. The buds definitely do have a sweet berry or grape candy smell, along with a slightly spicy aroma. They...”
“Very strong sour grape smell, similar to wine. Very tasty and a perfect mix between relaxing body buzz and uplifting head effects. One of my favorites.”
“Recently picked this strain up to try something new. I was impressed.  First taste reminds me of a peice of sour candy. The effects had me relaxed and giggling. would love to roll it up sometime.”

“An excellent strain from NETA, great fairly evenly split hybrid with strong aspects of both indica and sativa.  Sweet strong sugary grape fruity taste with a nice spicy diesel finish. Good pain relief with energy and sociability, potent and powerful, super party bud for the experienced needing some solid pain relief.  Light olive, copper and orange, a little yellow, and covered in honey frost.  

Stats from batch 532...”
“This strain is great for pain! Even as you're smoking grape stomper you can feel it numbing your throat, and chest area! I really enjoy smoking this strain!”

“Love this strain!! Within minutes of hitting it, I felt happy, focused, and energetic. It’s great for a daytime high. It’s lower in THC than most strains out there which is great for those who get paranoid. It’s also got a good amount of CBD. Great strain! Smell and taste are as nice as the high.”

“Personally one of my favorite strains; A light, airy smoke that goes down smooth with a pungent aroma and taste of grapes and a slight breeze of mint to boot. A perfect high on a gorgeous day for users seeking medical relief while being sociable or even just to unwind, I'd recommend this strain to both novices for recreation and patients for relief. All around, a very pleasant strain for anything on the go.”

“The name lends itself perfectly to the flavor. Captures the grape and diesel genetics perfectly and manages to hit you as soon as you start smoking. Very relaxing and thought provoking effects have me just walking up the Vegas strip in a happy daze. Perfect for the silo adventure”

“I smoked it for the first time last night while having a very nice conversation with a friend when it hit me like a freight train! At first, I felt nauseous and very lightheaded. So, I had to lie down for an hour. Afterward, I loved it! It is a great strain to smoke for relaxation before going to bed. I give 5 stars!”
“Heavy indica for me. I was yawning and so very relaxed. My body felt so heavy and my mind so chill. Great for after work relaxing in a bath.”

“I want to love this strain, but it's probably the worst I've ever bought over the last couple years. I really like the fruity sweet smell (I would almost call it kids chewable multivitamin" over candy) paired with a sativa if you sit up and lean back it gives great head rushes and the high is nice. but around an hour in
column4: my mood takes a HUGE nosedive. I recently found out I have internalized borderline personality d...”"

column3: “I smoked it for the first time last night while having a very nice conversation with a friend when it hit me like a freight train! At first, I felt nauseous and very lightheaded. So, I had to lie down for an hour. Afterward, I loved it! It is a great strain to smoke for relaxation before going to bed. I give 5 stars!”

“Out of all the strains I have tried, this is hands down the best for me. Helps my pain and stress and I dont get headaches like I do with other strains... Absolutely love it and I hate it when dispensaries are out of it when I need to get more!”
“Heavy indica for me. I was yawning and so very relaxed. My body felt so heavy and my mind so chill. Great for after work relaxing in a bath.”

“I want to love this strain, but it's probably the worst I've ever bought over the last couple years. I really like the fruity sweet smell (I would almost call it kids chewable multivitamin" over candy) paired with a sativa if you sit up and lean back it gives great head rushes and the high is nice. but around an hour in
column4: my mood takes a HUGE nosedive. I recently found out I have internalized borderline personality d...”"

column3: “Awesome Strain!👍🏽🔥💨”

“Great buds, not super dense but covered in crystals!
Smell is tropical, but skunky! 
Smoke isn't milky on the inhale, but almost ice-y and refreshing!
4/5 !!”

“I think this one is not for me.  It is a decent flavor, potency, looks, burn weed.  My mind was easily upset on this stuff, not quite sure why but only a couple of times have I had bud make me edgy.”

“A great example of a hybrid. While being slightly Sativa dom in my experiences it still has a very relaxing body high to it. The leafly description is honestly fairly accurate IMO. This is another good social strain if one has anxiety or is a more introverted person, helping open one's self to other's and lower the guard. I personally just had some of this strain a few days ago and after taking 2 hits of it as Natur...”"

“A great example of a hybrid. While being slightly Sativa dom in my experiences it still has a very relaxing body high to it. The leafly description is honestly fairly accurate IMO. This is another good social strain if one has anxiety or is a more introverted person, helping open one's self to other's and lower the guard. I personally just had some of this strain a few days ago and after taking 2 hits of it as Natur...”"
“love it! Having some shatter and it’s very uplifting and relaxing for your body   Love love love”

“I took a chance on this new strain and I did not expect to enjoy it as much as I did! It has the giggly and thoughtful effects of a sativa with a deep body high that hit me in waves of cool breezes. Both of these sensations were particularly helpful for my depression.”
“Tastes like Welch's”
“[AKA Rosé"] • Process—Lovely. It took several minutes to sink in
column4: during which I wondered if I should smoke more because I didn't really feel anything. Gradual onset. Also gradual leveling out. // • Stoniness—A pretty level
column5: controllable high. I rolled a joint and it felt like an extensive
column6: time-consuming process (about 30 minutes had passed in total with smoking a small bowl and rolling the joint). // • Somatic—I h...”"

column3: “Smell and flavor is amazing. Buds I got from Deep Roots clocked in at 24.8% THC and 0.05% CBD. Gives a super relaxing effect of an indica without the couch glue and the sativa side keeps me clear headed to work, while lowering my anxiety and pain. Nice.”
“Loved it!”
“nice”

“@mike_the_budtender with another strain review! Phenomenal flavor with this sour grape from Monkey Grass Farms. I smoked a few bowls before eating a meal at a restaurant. Those could be the best chicken tacos I have ever had. Anyways... The high was very creative and talkative. It lasted almost two hours which was a huge bonus. I would recommend this strain to slightly experienced smokers.”

“Taste just like the purple part of Trix the cereal and sticks to your mouth like it also... It's as if a grape explosion went off in my mouth.  Loving the sweet but loud aroma.  Lovely hybrid strain with a get up and go vibe.  Loving the trace of purple in the appearance too.. Hope this helps, Bless!”

“Yummy Sour Grape flavor, beautiful,  orange hairs and sticky! I originally bought this because of heavy grape smell in the jar and well worth the 15 bucks a gram. As I’m typing this my whole body totally relaxed and my knee pain in totally gone to the point I just noticed I’m sitting cross legged. You won’t be disappointed with this one! Wish I bought more! Enjoy! 🍇”

“Grape nerds! but a little more earthy and sweet. Effects are balanced and seems to lean a bit on the indica side (could have been the phenotype received), however its not too couch lock or too heady and was somewhere cozy in the middle.”
“really calms me down. just makes me want to relax. also doesnt have a hard come down.”
“Very good for my chronic foot pain. Nice flavor as well. Calms me down when my foot flares up. This one's a go.”

“-Very Strong Scent 
-Coated with LOTS of crystals
-Smokes very nice; smooth.

Definitely recommend this as a day-time med.”
“Good choice for daytime use. Nice even head buzz that lasts around 2 hours. Very sociable and doesn't have that crash. Comes down nice and easy. Great for appetite. I would buy again.”
“i think this strain of weed is what i have been missing all my life!! calms my nerves takes away the depression and it has a grate taste!!! i give this five stars all day long”
“One of my favorite strains now. I love the feel-good euphoria this one gives me. Five stars hands down.”
“This was not good for me at all. It gave me massive paranoia and triggered anxiety attacks and had me questioning my sanity. Granted I’ve got anxiety and PTSD.”
“Heavy indica for me. I was yawning and so very relaxed. My body felt so heavy and my mind so chill. Great for after work relaxing in a bath.”

“Wonderful strain for evening relaxation or any kind of art-making fix, as well as bunking in and watching a favorite show. I've only had the pleasure of smoking this about 4 times in the past week or so, and every time I was presented with a pleasant, aromatic smoking experience. Don't hesitate to try this if you have the chance!”

“I've used about 10 different strains by now, and so far this is my favorite. I love the creative energetic high I get from this. It is strong and I admit, fun to vape more than I need to for pain relief. I love to recline in my porch in the summer with this with the windows open and listen to all of the birds singing together. There are about six different birds screeching in trees up and down the streets, but I find...”
“After smoking this strain, all my body is capable of doing is watching anime and eating chocolate.”

“I use this strain for two main reasons:  It tastes delicious (even the shatter smells like grapes) and it helps me wake up in the morning and have something for breakfast. I suffer from PTSD and have problems eating. Grape Stomper works very well. As always, big shout-out to NETA for continuing to bring new medications to the people of New England.”

“Personally one of my favorite strains; A light, airy smoke that goes down smooth with a pungent aroma and taste of grapes and a slight breeze of mint to boot. A perfect high on a gorgeous day for users seeking medical relief while being sociable or even just to unwind, I'd recommend this strain to both novices for recreation and patients for relief. All around, a very pleasant strain for anything on the go.”
“It is very relaxing but still energetic”
“I give this strain a good rating for being helpful for pain relief.  I use it for strong spine pain.”

“Here it is 2am and I've been trying to type for 15 minutes lol getting distracted by mad max fury road. ..woaza um yea great flavor profile and real potent at 25 plus thc. ..man the gut problems get better with this. ..that's what I was using to help eat with cancer related issues”
“The fruity smell and amount of purple was awesome. Big fan of the 🍇 stomper.”

“I call this my “best weed,” and it’s not very pricy. It consistency delivers one of my favorite highs, and makes nights among friends even lighter and more of laughs. Also unlocks a creative funny center better than other straight up sativas I’ve had. A+”
“long lasting buzz that lets you Down gradually. great for the pain I'm in. mild - strong scent, stone.”
“Very good for my chronic foot pain. Nice flavor as well. Calms me down when my foot flares up. This one's a go.”
“[AKA Rosé"] • Process—Lovely. It took several minutes to sink in
column4: during which I wondered if I should smoke more because I didn't really feel anything. Gradual onset. Also gradual leveling out. // • Stoniness—A pretty level
column5: controllable high. I rolled a joint and it felt like an extensive
column6: time-consuming process (about 30 minutes had passed in total with smoking a small bowl and rolling the joint). // • Somatic—I h...”"

column3: “The name lends itself perfectly to the flavor. Captures the grape and diesel genetics perfectly and manages to hit you as soon as you start smoking. Very relaxing and thought provoking effects have me just walking up the Vegas strip in a happy daze. Perfect for the silo adventure”

“Grape Stomper is decent with a hay-like sweet odor coming off medium to large fluffy nugs.  The slightly purple buds are perfect for rolling joints, but do tend to burn fast in a pipe being so light.  The sweetness that comes off the flower does not translate so much into the taste with more a burnt tart flavor.  Never been a huge fan of bud that smells like my lawn.

With such a lukewarm reception to the terpene pro...”
“phenomenal strain especially in shatter form. hits great nice head high and your gonna cough your ass off lol would recommend to everyone”
“Great sativa leaning hybrid. I found it to be very effective as a day time strain. Would definitely get again. Very cerebral in it's effects too which I liked.”
“Sweet and tasty hybrid; not super strong so you are able to be productive. Loaded in trichomes and smells fruity with hints of a grape taste.”

“Delectable little surprise, I thoroughly enjoyed it. I was able to get in a shatter ranking in at 80.18% THC. After a good dab in my favorite personal dabber, the GoBee by BeeNails, my head was a flutter with a tingly buzz going from head to toe. Taste was excellent with a sweet flavor, and smooth smoke. Great for a nooner or right after work.”

“Grape Stomper is an awesome sativa dominant strain, very high potency & delivers a pleasant eurphoric head high.  Creativity & uplifted mental state were indeed among prime effects.  Body buzz as well yet still
Allowed for much physical activity.  Wonderful strain.”

“When grown the full 11 weeks, the calyxes swell to large, round, grape looking clusters. The smell is almost non existent, especially when grown with other strains. Making it perfect for small spaces. It's very pretty with colors ranging from pink to purple. Don't be tempted to pick early, a week makes the difference between 4 and 5 stars, it's very easy, and I accidentally let a little light leak form some intersex ...”
“This is good... Yes... but I’m looking for more of a Euphoric, rather than.sleepy Relaxed ... This was a Good Dose...”
“gives me the giggles. a lovely, happy high”
“I love this strain. Great with friends. It has everything you want good vibes, giggles, non-stop grinning. It then moves to a mild body high.  This is the perfect puff puff pass strain.”

“Yummy Sour Grape flavor, beautiful,  orange hairs and sticky! I originally bought this because of heavy grape smell in the jar and well worth the 15 bucks a gram. As I’m typing this my whole body totally relaxed and my knee pain in totally gone to the point I just noticed I’m sitting cross legged. You won’t be disappointed with this one! Wish I bought more! Enjoy! 🍇”
“love it! Having some shatter and it’s very uplifting and relaxing for your body   Love love love”

“I think this one is not for me.  It is a decent flavor, potency, looks, burn weed.  My mind was easily upset on this stuff, not quite sure why but only a couple of times have I had bud make me edgy.”
“Awesome Strain!👍🏽🔥💨”

“I want to love this strain, but it's probably the worst I've ever bought over the last couple years. I really like the fruity sweet smell (I would almost call it kids chewable multivitamin" over candy) paired with a sativa if you sit up and lean back it gives great head rushes and the high is nice. but around an hour in
column4: my mood takes a HUGE nosedive. I recently found out I have internalized borderline personality d...”"

column3: “I smoked it for the first time last night while having a very nice conversation with a friend when it hit me like a freight train! At first, I felt nauseous and very lightheaded. So, I had to lie down for an hour. Afterward, I loved it! It is a great strain to smoke for relaxation before going to bed. I give 5 stars!”

“Love this strain!! Within minutes of hitting it, I felt happy, focused, and energetic. It’s great for a daytime high. It’s lower in THC than most strains out there which is great for those who get paranoid. It’s also got a good amount of CBD. Great strain! Smell and taste are as nice as the high.”
“Loved the taste of this.  Was a nice plant to smoke and then go on a walk.  The sun was out.  This was nice and light.  Very euphoric but still functional.”

“Great strain friend left me quite a bit out of love from her medicinal pouch and I fell in love with this almost unrealistically deep purple bud with furry orange hair and resonating tri-chomes. If it tastes great then it is great and this bud tasted wonderful! Super heavy, soury grape taste guess there's a reason it's nicknamed Grape Stomper. Overall would highly recommend.”
“This strain did the more for my appetite last night than I have ever experienced before. My stomach is still kinda full from how much I ate last night. Also it is super euphoric.”
“Hits fast and makes you feel happy. Definitely can feel the body high fast and eventually get the head high. Puts me to bed after the come down.”
“Nice pleasant grape taste. Uplifting high.”

“I'm not big on sativas or sativa hybrids, but Grape Stomper offers a nice head buzz that makes me a bit happier even if doing something boring without tensing up my muscles or giving anxiety. I'd say I feel calm but with increased mental energy that I feel just motivated enough to do something with. I'd also say it helps a bit with concentration/focus and clarity of thought. It's easier to follow through my thought p...”

“I am a bit of a light weight when it comes to smoking just started back up due to bilateral amputations and the pain involved. The doc gave me morphine and dilaudid for the pain. The dilaudud made me halucinate and the morphine made me constipated so turned to medical marijuana. Grape Stomper literally kicked my butt. I got the pre-roll 4 hits off that and I was pretty much done for the day. I did not taste a grape f...”
“Rad as hell”
“really good starin. 🔥🔥🔥”
“I'd pluck these grapes off of any gay roman.”

“Mahatma, Premium Dispensary Trim,Shatter Hash smoked through a slightly dirty oil rig (several smokes).  Very nice, mellow high.  I got a good cough coming off the hit, so a bit more intense than the last try.  A better overall experience than last time.  Relaxing without being overly sedating.  Great pain and swelling relief.  Calming.  Not so much with the talkative this time, but still creative.”

“One of my favorite creative/focus highs tbh.  It makes a good daytime strain, not bogging you down.  Makes me want to draw and doodle and just do anything with lots of colors when I smoke a lot.  It creeps up at first and lasts a good while too.  My only major downside is that it makes it hard to fall asleep, so I don't smoke it too late in the evening.”

“was great over all ! looked great had a darker tone and was covered in tri cones ! made me fill stress free and keep me even headed ! recommend to be very one and anyone ! great over all ! will get again :)”
“Good strain, nice head buzz and body relaxation, feeling happy, and relaxed.”

“Large, round, and dense buds.  I underestimated this strain's potency.  Hammered from 5-6 vapes.   Had taken a normal dose DXM with one beer before vaping, and actually got vertigo and nearly fainted.  Don't get me wrong, it was pretty amazing getting stomped like that.”

“One of my all time faves , effects me like an energetic indica. Ive found that here in Denver its very important to double check the genetics before you buy,pretty much every place has a version of this strain but I guess that applies to everything”

“Grape stomper first discovered this strain in 2012.Heard a lot about the strain.Sour grapes very enjoyable can be a little racier for me at least.Smell and taste is like some good white wine.Picked up at x' location's West valley AZ.
If I need to clean house in the morning or a morning starter this might be the strain for you.”
“one of my favorites, great all around heady high euphoric feel very nice”

“This has worked THE BEST for me so far. I suffer from chronic pain, ptsd, anxiety,...basically I'm a hot mess. When I smoked this my head chilled, my pain faded away, I was hungry and able to eat, my mind was clear, and I slept well. Definitely my personal #1”
“Good choice for daytime use. Nice even head buzz that lasts around 2 hours. Very sociable and doesn't have that crash. Comes down nice and easy. Great for appetite. I would buy again.”

“-Very Strong Scent 
-Coated with LOTS of crystals
-Smokes very nice; smooth.

Definitely recommend this as a day-time med.”
“really calms me down. just makes me want to relax. also doesnt have a hard come down.”

“Grape nerds! but a little more earthy and sweet. Effects are balanced and seems to lean a bit on the indica side (could have been the phenotype received), however its not too couch lock or too heady and was somewhere cozy in the middle.”

“Taste just like the purple part of Trix the cereal and sticks to your mouth like it also... It's as if a grape explosion went off in my mouth.  Loving the sweet but loud aroma.  Lovely hybrid strain with a get up and go vibe.  Loving the trace of purple in the appearance too.. Hope this helps, Bless!”

“@mike_the_budtender with another strain review! Phenomenal flavor with this sour grape from Monkey Grass Farms. I smoked a few bowls before eating a meal at a restaurant. Those could be the best chicken tacos I have ever had. Anyways... The high was very creative and talkative. It lasted almost two hours which was a huge bonus. I would recommend this strain to slightly experienced smokers.”
“nice”
“Loved it!”

“Smell and flavor is amazing. Buds I got from Deep Roots clocked in at 24.8% THC and 0.05% CBD. Gives a super relaxing effect of an indica without the couch glue and the sativa side keeps me clear headed to work, while lowering my anxiety and pain. Nice.”
“Tastes like Welch's”

“I took a chance on this new strain and I did not expect to enjoy it as much as I did! It has the giggly and thoughtful effects of a sativa with a deep body high that hit me in waves of cool breezes. Both of these sensations were particularly helpful for my depression.”

“A great example of a hybrid. While being slightly Sativa dom in my experiences it still has a very relaxing body high to it. The leafly description is honestly fairly accurate IMO. This is another good social strain if one has anxiety or is a more introverted person, helping open one's self to other's and lower the guard. I personally just had some of this strain a few days ago and after taking 2 hits of it as Natur...”"
“This strain is great for pain! Even as you're smoking grape stomper you can feel it numbing your throat, and chest area! I really enjoy smoking this strain!”
“This is my before bed strain.. Relaxing and I love the tingles! Too much and you'll get couch locked.”

“Out of all the strains I have tried, this is hands down the best for me. Helps my pain and stress and I dont get headaches like I do with other strains... Absolutely love it and I hate it when dispensaries are out of it when I need to get more!”
“When I smoked grape stomper it was pretty good it gets you lit hella fast but there's better but imma experience wit this strain was it made me hella chill”

“Another fine strain from Igadi in Tabenash.  Just like the Lavender Jones pre-rolls we grabbed and held in reserve, we took a while before we sampled this strain.  Even though it is supposed to be slightly sativa dominant, both the Mrs and I found it to lean more toward an indica's effects.  It has a very nice aroma...similar to Grape Ape but not quite as distinct.  It burned perfectly and had a slightly sweet taste ...”
“Gassy inhale, grape exhale/aftertaste, watch for sleepiness.”
“good relaxing strain. it may me a bit anxious but a solid chillaxing feel”

“Great buds, not super dense but covered in crystals!
Smell is tropical, but skunky! 
Smoke isn't milky on the inhale, but almost ice-y and refreshing!
4/5 !!”
“Has a mild onset time. The high once it kicked in seemed to immediately calm my mind. Highly recommend for those suffering from PTSD, anxiety or depression.”
“great; true to strain description; a good, outgoing happy”

“Just scored a gr of this rare stuff from TGS.  Called Grape Escape the smell is like blueberry cheesecake.  All the MJ terps score high.  The straight-up high is strong and long-lasting.  All round great Sativa luv'rs strain.  ns”

“This is an absolute delight! The flavor is unreal and the effect takes hold and doesn't let go! The pungent grape flavor coats the tongue and just keeps getting better as time goes on. I have rarely tasted anything this good! Very euphoric but focused high. Anxiety melted away very quickly. I love this strain!”

“Also know as sour grapes, grape stomper is a cannasours dream. This indica dominate hybrid of Chem DawgxSour Diesel and Purple Elephant. The particular batch tested at above 28%. Now I should mention that I have a hard time believing any flower over 25%. This stuff I firmly believe is at or near what the numbers say. The bud itself was some of the most beautiful and crystallized flower I've seen in a very long time ...”

“This strain provides a decent high, helps greatly with pain but leaves a little lacking in the taste department for me.  No grape flavor tasted.  I would buy this again but only if I could not find a strain I like better.”

“Nice sativa leaning hybrid. Has a nice diesel/chem scent with a sweet grape to it and nugs look incredible. Smokes well and looks amazing with bright purple highlights in field of crystals. Good strain for being out and about without needing to be too focused,”

“Very strong hybrid. Euphoric and relaxing. Alot of energy and talkative. Yet a very calming sensation. Smells a little like grapes but mostly overpowered by the skunky musky stank. Yum Yum!!! Taste really sour and skunky. I do enjoy this strain but I think I smoked to much and got really sleepy.”
“sweet with a nice grapety aftertaste and smooth smoke hands down... deep roots harvest did right with this baby @ 26.8% THC u cant go wrong. shoutout to Inyo for carrying this amazing strain”

“Apperance is dense bud structure and mix of light Green and dark leaves with a frosty amount of small trichomes 

The scent is a pungent sweet sour aroma

the taste came through on the exhale  in a sweet floral after taste

The high is a good day time strain that relives body soreness and promotes relaxation and a increase in appetite  the feeling is really felt in a head high that makes your eyes feel heavy but more...”

“I had gotten this thinking it was an Indica and was surprised to find out that it wasn't. I don't know why they sold it to me that way... At least it tastes good and feels good. I like it for the taste at least.”
“oh my geez had an extract cartridge from emerald cups tasted just like grapes complete an full relaxation of mind and body”

“If you're lucky enough to get your hands on Grape Stomper, look no further. Relaxed, slightly euphoric, chilllll. Good end of the day kind of high, unless you're going out dancing, then hell yeah! The Indica can make you feel just a tad bit lazy. No paranoia or anxiousness. I did smoke this on nights I went out and socialized and felt pretty leveled headed, as well as could follow conversations and was interested in ...”
“Had this strain in concentrate form. Sweet candyish taste. A solid head high, with a tingling body high. Pain effectiveness is mediocre.”
“Flavor packs a punch, made me relaxed and helped with my nausia”
“feel like running”

“Tight fim compact nugs with a wonderful grape aroma. One joint eased my cramps and turned my frown upside down. Acquired from The Apothecary in Tucson, this strain is not only good meds but also a great sociable buzz. A-.”
“This strain is fantastic for me. Nice flavor and smell with a nice Indica glow! Sweet relief from painful spasms.”
“tastes as its named very mellow”

“It literally smells like wine grapes, amazing undertone and not skunky. Small hurs of purple. Great great bud and caked in crystals. It also gives off that white grape smell a bit. The high is niceee”
“a very nice uplifting high. great for dancing.”
“frosty green and white trichs. fruity smell, taste just as good as it smells if not better”
“Perfect for day time use!”
“very sweet taste and relaxing high”
“Light fruity (grape) flavor. Not too heady.”
“Experienced a great high with this strain. Very relaxing and uplifting.”

“Super amazing strain! Grape Stomper smells very much like grapes and berries! It tastes equally amazing! It would be hard to get heavy work done, but being a little spaced and doing something fun is what makes this strain absolutely phenomenal! It brightens any dark day and makes everything awesome! Works great for having a mellow feel for the rest of the body as well.”
“Really boring bud. Felt like it was bred for the novelty of the taste and not much else.”
“Not a fan. Short lasting. Weak euphoria.  Some Body pain relief however.”
“Really good bud, helps with my adhd”

“Slight points off for making me sleepy and not super social, but this strain gave me some intense visuals when I closed my eyes. I went over a bridge on a blue river, I explored the universe and saw beautiful purple stars, I hiked in the mountains and watched an intense yellow sunset. My partner reported visuals as well, and we both felt comfortable and tingly. Unfortunately, we both fell asleep before we could see h...”

“The taste is sweet, which I think is pretty neat. However, the heightened awareness was sensory overload and that pissed me off, but I liked that there was absolutely no cough.  I liked that some folks had better reviews, I'm just sorry I could report better news. Maybe, I'll give it another go and not have the sensory overload.”
“Usually I found to be very giggly on Sour Grape, but this time it made me extremely paranoid no BUENO”
“Dizzy dizzy dizzy :(”
“Pretty damn awesome”
“Top 10 strain, the effects are almost felt just from smelling it's buds.”
“Super smooth smoke with a nice little punch to the face!”
“This shit is the bomb. Definitely on my top 5. Hits hard, two hits vs. 5. Dank.”

“This is a lovely smoke! Perfect for the sativa lovers who want some of the body effects of an indica without the sleepiness. The color is absolutely gorgeous and the flavor is a delightful grape candy. Five stars easy.”
“It is such a happy, uplift, witty, talkative pot. Absolute great”
“Excellent buds.”
“one dab of this put me in a straight kush Coma homie night night 😷👍😴”
“The description you guys have for this strain is totally accurate. G.S. is excellent indeed. First time smoking it as I write this review. I like a lot and now it has my top choice status!!!”
“Fruity and delicious tasting strain. I find it to be mellow and uplifting, perfect for medicating during the daytime. Buds were dense and very frosty.”
“Snacky, energetic, creative.”
“Great bud. No complaints except it's a little heady for me. Overall awesome pick if your mellow but don't want to have your whole day bogged down. Great day or night high.”
“This is one of my favorites.  It doesn't make me lazy.  I can function well on this during the day.”
“good all around hybrid”
“smoked some of this and spent the next half hour having an intense staredown with a cricket”
“Really nice mellow high for just relaxing and unwinding from the day.  The dry eyes makes me sleepy though. Perfect for before a meditation or deeper brain wave function”

“smells really good
euphoria wellness has the best
buds”
“4.5 stars i just wish it was slightly more indica heavy but this is a sweet fruity connoisseurs choice med size nugs none the less💯”

“Smoked this with my boyfriend, and we both felt uncomfortable and jittery. It made me anxious and quick to anger, which usually doesn't happen to me. Felt like we were sinking, and lots of couch lock.”
“Shit gets me too hype!”
“when its from the club it's the beysttt”
“Great high, but very harsh.”

“Wow! this is a great strain to smoke! the way it smells, OMG! the way it looks is bright green with orange hairs coming off it. the sweet grape smell does it justice. relaxing high with a upbeat tone to it. top of the top here..”
“this strain had it for me but i didnt like  how it just made me so tired other then that it had wonderful flavor burned smooth and had me uplifted like no other”

“Awesome smell and flavour 🍇 
very nice creep effect like 5-10 minutes in.”
“Frosty flowers, superb smoke.”
“Amazing strain!!!”

“A Hypbrid that might as well be a Sativa.
The grape side doesn't seem to come through that hard, mostly a sour diesel effect.

Negatives made me feel very jittery, and Anxious, a tiny bit paranoid but not to much. 

Overall Id say this is not a great strain for myself, or if your the type to get easily anxious.

P.S. Had some before a theater show hoping I would get zone out and ended up wanting to get out of ...”

“Headstrong buzzzzzzzzzzz  followed by mingling body melting .... after two to three deep hits...

It works.... kinda like tequila!

Wild ass worm!”

“Mood: uplifted, relaxed. 
Physical: kinda gave me a headache actually. Way dizzy and even a bit nauseous. Heavy body and heavy head. 
Mental: got that dyslexia feeling, foggy on what to say or type. 

Meh.”
“Decent mind and body high. Not extraordinary in either category.”
“out of the 1000's of strains I've seen, this one by far stands out the most. Words cannot describe this strain only inhaling can.”

“I actually just got 1/2 of sour grapes for 50$ at the lab. for a low shelf flower.  I was surprised how dank and dense this herb was. at first when inhaled it takes a while to kick , great tingly body feeling and head high. for some reason i was told it was an indica but even tho I wake and bake. I still have tons of energy like almost a sativa feeling has sour aroma. and earthy grape taste”
“one if my favourite all time strains right chear....love love live it...all day and all night strain... put it against any strain and a solid contender..thank you Creator for this strain.”
“Fantastic cross”
“Personally, it didn't help with anxious symptoms like butterflies in my chest, but it overall was really good. Made me feel relaxed yet alert and was a good chill day time smoke.”
“Good Fuken Sativa”
“It's great and the people are so .helpful .”
“GREAT STRAIN!”
